PositioningOffset Property

CDXML Name:PositioningOffset
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_PositioningOffset
CDX Constant Value:0x0D08
Data Size:CDXPoint2D
Property of objects:kCDXObj_ObjectTag, kCDXObj_ChemicalProperty
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0
Required?No

Description:

Offset positioning.

This object should be positioned at a given offset from the relevent point (usually the center) of its containing object (for kCDXProp_Positioning = kCDXPositioningType_Offset) or from the top left of the page (for kCDXProp_Positioning = kCDXPositioningType_Absolute).

If this property is absent:

This object will be positioned with zero offset from the relevent point of its containing object (that is, at the center of the object).
